rosalind module¶

class rosalind.Rosalind¶

Bases: object

compute_punnet(alleles_1, alleles_2, get_dominance_ratio=False)¶

Returns the set of genotype ratios for the new generation along with a punnet square of the parental cross.

Parameters

  • alleles_1 (str) – parent 1 allele set

  • alleles_2 (str) – parent 2 allele set

Returns

genotype ratio in the new generation, punnet crosses

Return type

dict, list

convert_fasta_to_pandas(record)¶
Converts a fasta record object to pandas DataFrame.

Columns represent nucleotides, rows individual sequences.

Parameters

record (dict) – fasta record object

Returns

Formatted DataFrame

Return type

pandas DataFrame

count_nucleotides(seq)¶

Returns the number of nucleotides, listed in alphabetical order.

Parameters

seq (str) – DNA sequence

Returns

number of each nucleotide in the order [A, C, G, T]

Return type

list

count_point_mutations(seq1, seq2)¶

Counts the number of point mutations when comparing two sequences of the same length.

Parameters

  • seq1 (string) – first sequence to compare

  • seq2 (string) – second sequence to compare

Returns

the number of mismatched nucleotides

Return type

int

get_consensus(record, print_report=True)¶

Computes the consensus sequence and consensus matrix of a fasta record.

Parameters

  • record (dict) – fasta record

  • print_report (bool, optional) – set to true to print out Rosalind format, defaults to True

Returns

consnsus sequence, consensus matrix

Return type

str, np.array

get_gc_contents(record)¶

Reutrns the GC score of all sequences in a fasta record object.

Parameters

record (dict) – keys are sequence labels, values are the respective sequences.

Raises

TypeError – if type(record) not dictionary

Returns

collection containing {labels:GC-percentage} as well as top the label and score with highest the GC percentage.

Return type

dict

get_genepool_stats(HH=2, Hh=2, hh=2, genepool=None)¶

Computes the statistics of genotypes in a genepool.

Parameters

  • HH (int, optional) – number of homozyhous dominant individuals, defaults to 2

  • Hh (int, optional) – number of heterozygous individuals, defaults to 2

  • hh (int, optional) – number of homozygous recessive indivoduals, defaults to 2

Returns

percentage of each genotype within a genepool

Return type

dict

get_mendelian_probas(HH=2, Hh=2, hh=2)¶
Computes the mendelian probability of an individual inheriting a domninat allele,

assuming any two randomly chosen individual can mate from a know genegool.

Parameters

  • HH (int, optional) – number of homozygous individuals, defaults to 2

  • Hh (int, optional) – number of heterozygous individuals, defaults to 2

  • hh (int, optional) – number of homozygous recessive individuals, defaults to 2

Returns

the probability of an individual containing dominant allele after random parental mating.

Return type

float

parse_fasta(filename)¶

Parses FASTA files and returns a sequence record. Keys: Roslaind IDs, values: genomic sequence.

Parameters

filename (str) – name of text file containing FASTA data

Returns

Record object where keys are FASTA labels and values are FASTA sequences

Return type

dict

rabbits(n, k)¶
Wascally Wabbits: Returns the total number of rabbits produced ater n generations,

when given a reproduction factor of k.

Parameters

  • n (int) – number of generations

  • k (int) – reproduction factor

Returns

Total number of rabbits after n generations

Return type

int

‘AACTCAG’ –> ‘UUGAGUC’.
